Description: Ostracon, fragment of the rim of a red-brown pottery slightly grooved vessel, the fabric is partially grey in section, the exterior is painted brown and bears faint traces of three lines of black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (395006) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/395006)
